plot: A blind man has just bought an engagement ring when his hearing gets super sensitive. Seizure? House's mom drops by with a surprise. Park has an LSD trip.

House and the team battle to save a successful, independent blind man who is struck down by a mysterious illness, just prior to him asking for his girlfriend's hand in marriage. Meanwhile, House's mother unexpectedly arrives at Princeton Plainsboro to inform him of her new beau.—Fox Publicity
